Question
========

Suppose that if rain is expected the probability is 75% that it will will actually rain. If **no** rain is expected the probability is 30% that it will rain. Rain is expected for 20% of the days of the next month. What is the probability that it will rain?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,13
* 0,10
* 0,20
* 0,39

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.13: Incorrect
* 0.10: Incorrect
* 0.20: Incorrect
* 0.39: Correct
